summary: In summary, Contoso Wireless offers high-speed internet service with speeds up to 100 Mbps and unlimited data for $39.99 per month. There are a number of churn prevention options available, such as a 90-day satisfaction guarantee, auto-renewal option, and loyalty program. In addition, the service comes with features such as parental controls and secure Wi-Fi network. Finally, customers can sign up online by filling out an online form and can expect to have their service set up within 24 hours.
